column4: so is 2.9 the gnome devel release or is it an actual new release?
odd minor numbers indicate development releases

the error you're getting with the wmv files is a bug that needs to be fixed.

no, it's a bug that needs to be fixed.
yah, it seems like they put it in on purpose, but then forgot that wmv has asf video. I'd like to just turn it off.
yes
no

difference in objectives between the projects

those are the standard gnome menus - we've reverted to those for the time being due to the new gnome menu system
they will not stay that way

ubuntu-devel has the new structure proposal, which will be cool and new
